title: God Bless Football- The BCS and Roselyn the witch!
description:
Stugotz and Billy react to a not great but not terrible Thursday Night Football game between Lamar Jackson and Tom Brady. Chris Simms gets us ready for Week 8 in the NFL and casually tells us about the time Madonna got in the way of him selling his condo to A-Rod (8:46). Stu give you winner in Stu Ya Gotz (34:39). Chris Cote joins the show to discuss dirty names in college football with Mike Golic (38:25) and to reveal the first BCS Rankings of the season (48:43). Friendly witch, Priestess Roselyn, joins Carl Douglas, Joba Chamberlain, K-Funk and a surprise guest to make NFL picks (59:17).
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
